## power analysis 


```{r, message=F, warning=F}
# Gillmore Needle test:
mean.diff=15.2-8; sd=1.6
power.t.test(delta=mean.diff, sd=sd, sig.level = 0.05, power=0.9, type="two.sample", alternative = "two.sided")
```


* 3 samples in each group is enough 

```{r, message=F, warning=F}
# PH
mean.diff=8.08-7.78; sd=0.9
power.t.test(delta=mean.diff, sd=sd, sig.level = 0.05, power=0.8, type="two.sample", alternative = "two.sided")
```

* 142 samples are needed.
